statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null || true; dir_name=$(basename "$dir"); printf '[%s]' "$dir_name"; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -c gc.autodetach=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -c gc.autodetach=false rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); printf ' ['; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf '⎇ %s' "$branch"; fi; status=$(git -c gc.autodetach=false status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$status" ]; then modified=$(echo "$status" | grep -c '^.M' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); added=$(echo "$status" | grep -c '^A' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); deleted=$(echo "$status" | grep -c '^.D' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); untracked=$(echo "$status" | grep -c '^??' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); [ "$modified" -gt 0 ] && printf '!%d' "$modified"; [ "$added" -gt 0 ] && printf '+%d' "$added"; [ "$deleted" -gt 0 ] && printf '✘%d' "$deleted"; [ "$untracked" -gt 0 ] && printf '?%d' "$untracked"; fi; printf ']'; fi
